topic.title: Module 1 - Create Material Purchase Requisitions in SAP

block.text: Purchase Requisitioner Certification Training Program
Create Material Purchase Requisitions in SAP
Level 2 Course 2
Create Material Purchase Requisitions in SAP
Personalize Your SAP User Setting

Create six different variations of a
material purchase requisition
Personalize your SAP user settings to gain efficiencies in purchase requisition processing

pages.title: External Catalogs
pages.instruction: Click on the tab to learn how to create the External Catalog PR in SAP.

block.text: Catalog purchases are the preferred method for creating a material purchase requisition.
Grainger
Motion
Fastenal
The pricing on the materials available in these catalogs has already been negotiated with the supplier by CSSP.
When you add a catalog material to a purchase requisition it automatically updates the PR line item with much of the data required for the purchase.
External catalog materials can be included as an NCS purchase
External catalog materials can not be included as a DPL or DPS purchase

pages.instruction_3: Click here to learn how to create a Favorite List and Repeat On Function in SAP.​

feedback.left: The user parameters should already be set for you by Global IT in your SAP. You can always make changes to your personal User Parameters as well as Defaults and Address information in SAP by clicking System > User Profile > Own Data.
feedback.right:
The personal setting of a transaction helps you to customize the Item details section. Through the personal settings, you can specify:

  • Which fields should be visible or hidden
  • Default codes for Item Category, Account Assignment Category, Plant etc.
  • The arrangement of columns from left to right

block.text: A material master is the collection of all data for a material into a single record.
Item Description
Unit of Measure
Purchasing Group
Price Valuation
Plant Data
This information is housed in SAP and important to many functions including:
Purchasing and invoice posting
Inventory management
Sales order processing
Production planning
Purchase Request for Material Masters
A stock material purchase which is set up to run through MRP
A stock material purchase is created outside of MRP
When a purchase of a non-stock material is made against a cost object via a manual purchase requisition

pages.title: Material Masters
pages.instruction: Click on the tab to learn how to Create Material Master PR in SAP to Cost Center

block.text: Manual creation of Material Master purchase requisition to a cost object
Several MRP materials are not MRP relevant so, they must be manually purchased.
Examples: Manually purchased ingredients, chemicals and packaging materials required for manual purchase requisitions.
Create the purchase using the material master versus creating a free text PR.
A Blanket Purchase Order refers to an agreement between an organization and a supplier to deliver goods at a predetermined price for a specific period of time.
One PO and one PO line per price period (monthly, quarterly, annually). The blanket PO should not be valid for more than 12 months.
A goods receipt is required for each delivery.
Payment of an order is triggered by Invoice.
Instead of issuing 96 smaller Purchase Orders
An organization wants to submit 8 Orders per month to a particular supplier
Single Blanket Purchase Order & One PO for the determined pricing period
MRP is the best option to use for planning purchases and is preferred whenever possible.
BPOs should be reserved for POs with more than 5 separate deliveries per PO per month.
One PO and one PO line per price period (monthly, quarterly, annual*). Not to be valid more than 12 months.
3 way match POs should be utilized.
Outline agreement, PR creation, PO creation and communication must occur prior to price effective date.
Must utilize outline agreement in order to drive the appropriate contracted pricing, pay terms, and vendor partnering.
PR Short text should include: “BPO [time period] – [Product]”
PR Quantity should be the average volume you typically procure per PO “timeframe”.
Always issue your PR quantity in the BASE unit of measure on the material master.
Delivery Date should be the last day of the PO “timeframe”.
Pricing on an outline agreement and supplier invoice should roll up to a single net, per-unit price.
No separate Fuel, delivery, or miscellaneous charges.
Pricing should be no more than 2 decimal points.
You may scale up the UOM to a larger unit or use price per 100, 1000, etc
Header text should include specific notes to the supplier regarding the BPO and how orders will be placed.
If demurrage or other fees are accumulated, process is as follows:
Supplier should inform the PO processor of the need to add on demurrage fees.
PO processor confirms with site that demurrage should be added.
If demurrage is approved, the site will create a PR to account for the added fee.
PO Processer adds the PR to the existing PO as a new line.
Supplier may then invoice against that line in Ariba.

pages.title: Rules for Successful Chemical BPOs
pages.instruction: Click on the tab to learn how to create Chemical Blanket PR in SAP.

block.text: PO, GR, BOL/Packing slip, and Invoicing should be related to the price period in which the product shipped.
Good receipts (GR) must use the BOL/Packing slip info in the reference field.
Good receipts should be entered within 24 hours of receipt using the PO on the packing slip.
Suppliers are suggested to upload any documentation (invoice) during Ariba Network invoice creation.
Communication between the planner and receiver is necessary to ensure accuracy and close out completed POs.
Planner should manage the balance of the PO to confirm GRs are matching up to IRs.

pages.title: Free Text (Spot Buy)
pages.instruction: Click on the tab to learn how to create Free Text PR in SAP.
pages.instruction_1: Click on the tab to view the Data Definition Documents (MRO and Service Material Group).​
pages.instruction_2: Click on the tab to view information on the impact of choosing the right (or wrong) Material Group.​

block.text: A free text purchase is one where the Requisitioner is not purchasing a material from a catalog or material master
The Requisitioner provides a description of the type of material needed
The Requisitioner provides an estimate on the price they expect to pay
Offers flexibility in the purchasing process when the business requires something that is not available through our catalogs or contracts with select suppliers
A free text purchase should only be created after the Requisitioner has determined the material is not available through a catalog or material master
Vendor Managed Inventory or VMI is a streamlined approach to inventory management and order fulfillment.
VMI is a service provided by approved suppliers to monitor and maintain specific inventory levels at Cargill sites.
Janitorial supplies
Bolts or other hardware
Safety equipment

pages.title: Vendor Managed Inventory (VMI)
pages.instruction: Click on the tab to see the list of suppliers who support VMI.

block.text: Managed by Ariba Integrated Suppliers
Non-Integrated Suppliers use blanket purchase orders

pages.title: Vendor Managed Inventory (VMI)
pages.instruction: Click on the tab to learn how to create VMI PR in SAP.
pages.instruction_1: Click on the tab to view the Data Definition Documents (MRO and Service Material Group).​

block.text:
Integrated Supplier:

  • Provides a proposed list of materials for replenishment
  • Enters a quote in the external catalog

Requisitioner:

  • Uses the external catalog to pull the e-quote items into the SAP purchase requisition
  • Requires a specific role in SAP to process this Z2WM material PR type
Approval
PR gets auto-converted to a Z2WM PO

Supplier:

  • Confirms the PO
  • Creates an invoice in Ariba
Never add non-VMI materials to this type of purchase
Do not mix VMI purchases with other purchase types
No goods receipt is required for the VMI order
Other items on the PO should required a goods receipt before payment should be processed
Freight charges are primarily on Service Purchase Requisitions
Four common ways that material freight charges are managed
We can request that the vendor ship freight to collect on the Cargill account with select carriers.
The Requisitioner can add a line with estimated freight charges.
The PO Processor can add the freight as a condition at the time of vendor confirmation.
The Requisitioners may be asked to enter freight charges into the PR once the materials have been invoiced.
